verbs.description: unthicken (third-person singular simple present unthickens, present participle unthickening, simple past and past participle unthickened)

examples: Ricouer's theory helps unthicken the images in these ancient texts, and there's a way in which this “unthickening” can be seen as exactly the work of the university.
The darkness unthickens and a blowsy moon appears at the window.
